Class MvpdListArrayAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<IProvider>
        • com.brightcove.examples.adapters.MvpdListArrayAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class MvpdListArrayAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<IProvider>
    ArrayAdapter class for rendering the row items in the Mvpd selector
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maximilian Nyman (max.nyman@anvilcreative.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView(int position,
                        android.view.View convertView,
                        android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Updates and returns the row item view container/wrapper at the provided position for the list view
        Specified by:
        getView in interface android.widget.Adapter
        Overrides:
        getView in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter<IProvider>
        Parameters:
        position - the row position to update
        convertView - the current/previous view container/wrapper for the row item. If null, then a new view will be created
        parent - the parent view container
        Returns:
        the row item view container/wrapper
        Since:
        1.0
